chatbot.title: Help
chatbot.intro: Hallo, dit is de automatische begeleidingschat van Alkemio. Het kan je antwoorden geven op basis van Alkemio's documentatie. Waar ben je naar op zoek?

infoDialog.title: Alkemio Help
infoDialog.content:
Use the Alkemio guidance chat to get answers to your questions about the platform. This __AI-powered personal assistant__ allows you to interact with content from the Alkemio Help Center. It will also provide the sources of the answers.

Want to know more? Click [here](https://alkem.io/vc/guidance) to visit its $t(common.profile)!

feedback.tooltip: Dit bericht is automatisch gegenereerd op basis van de documentatie van Alkemio. Je feedback is zeer relevant voor ons!

confirmNewChat.title: Een nieuw gesprek beginnen?

Nog steeds vragen? Leer hier meer
Neem contact op met het Alkemio team

releaseNotes.title: <big>ðŸŽ‰ Platform update!</big> <small>We hebben leuk nieuws, klik hier om er alles over te lezen!</small>

cookie.consent: Door op "Accepteer Alle Cookies" te klikken, gaat u ermee akkoord dat er cookies op uw apparaat worden opgeslagen die bijdragen aan de website navigatie en het anayleren van website gebruik.
cookie.settings: Bij het bezoeken van een website kan informatie worden opgeslagen in uw browser in de vorm van cookies. Deze informatie kan over u, uw voorkeuren en uw apparaat gaan. Meestal wordt deze informatie gebruikt om de website zo goed mogelijk te laten werken. Sommige websites gebruiken de cookies ook voor marketingdoeleinden. Aangezien Alkemio geen advertenties toestaat op de website, maken wij slechts onderscheid tussen twee soorten cookies.
cookie.technical: Technisch noodzakelijke cookies: maken het mogelijk op de website te navigeren en uw voorkeuren op te slaan.
cookie.analysis: Analytische cookies: staan ons toe vast te stellen hoe gebruikers onze dienst gebruiken om de gebruikerservaring te verbeteren.

importCalloutsDialog.title: Apply New $t(common.template)
importCalloutsDialog.description:
You are about to apply a new $t(common.template). This action will permanently delete your current $t(common.innovation-flow). However, the existing collaboration tools linked to different phases will remain and be grouped under the first phase of the new setup.

Please choose one of the following options:

importCalloutsDialog.noDescription: This will replace only the $t(common.innovation-flow), keeping your current collaboration tools as they are.

visibility.title: Zichtbaarheid
visibility.public: Public: This $t(common.space) and its contents are visible for everyone on the platform. Users can only contribute if they are a $t(common.member).
visibility.private: Private: This $t(common.space) is visible to everyone on the platform, but the content is only visible to $t(common.members). Please note that both the information in the $t(common.profile) and the context are publicly visible.
visibility.publicSubspace: Public: This $t(common.subspace) and all its contents are visible to everyone who has access to the $t(common.space) it belongs to. If the $t(common.space) itself is public, this $t(common.subspace) and its contents will be visible to all users, including those outside the $t(common.space).
visibility.privateSubspace: Private: This $t(common.subspace) is visible to all $t(common.members) of the $t(common.space), but its contents are restricted and can only be accessed by $t(common.members) of the $t(common.subspace). No application required: All $t(common.space) $t(common.members) can directly join, without you having to review their application.

membership.title: $t(common.Membership)
membership.open: No Application required: All $t(common.space) $t(common.members) can directly join, without you having to review their application.
membership.applications: Application required: If people want to become a $t(common.member), they have to fill in the application form. You receive their applications (see $t(common.community) tab here) and can choose to accept these or not. If you want, you can choose to leave the form empty.
membership.invitations: Invitation only: Users can only become a $t(common.member) after youâ€™ve invited them (which you can do from the $t(common.community) tab here) or if they are added manually. There is no Apply or Join button for others to click.
membership.hostOrganizationJoin: Host $t(common.organization): Allow people who are associated with {{host}} to directly join, without having to apply or be invited.
membership.allowSubspaceAdminsToInviteMembers: $t(common.space) invitations: Allow $t(common.admins) of $t(common.subspaces) to invite users to their $t(common.subspace). Users who were not yet a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.space), will become so when they accept the $t(common.subspace) invitation.
membership.allowSubspaceAdminsToInviteMembersSubspa: $t(common.space) invitations: Allow $t(common.admins) of $t(common.subspaces) within this $t(common.subspace) to invite users directly to their own $t(common.subspace). If a user is not yet a $t(common.member) of this $t(common.subspace), they will automatically become one upon accepting the invitation. Note: Only users who are already $t(common.members) of the $t(common.space) can be invited this way.

memberActions.title: Toegestane acties voor leden
memberActions.createBlocks: Create $t(common.posts): Allow $t(common.members) to create $t(common.posts) for collaboration tools & $t(common.posts). If you deactivate this, $t(common.members) will still be able to contribute to existing $t(common.posts) and calls, but will not be able to create new $t(common.posts).
memberActions.createSubspaces: Create $t(common.subspaces): Allow $t(common.members) to create $t(common.subspaces) in this $t(common.space). If you deactivate this, you can still create $t(common.subspaces) yourself and add other people as an $t(common.admin) inside the $t(common.subspace).
memberActions.eventsFromSubspaces: $t(common.subspace) events: Allow events from $t(common.subspaces) to be visible on this $t(common.space) calendar as well.
memberActions.inheritRights: Allow $t(common.members) of the parent $t(common.community) to contribute without needing to join first.
memberActions.supportAsAdmin: Alkemio Support: Allow the Alkemio Support team to act as an $t(common.admin) in this $t(common.space).

registration.header: Create an $t(common.account) to start using Alkemio
registration.introduction:
Welcome to Alkemio! Safe $t(common.spaces) for collaboration, education and professionals.

Alkemio is designed to benefit society. Please read and accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy before you continue.
registration.introduction-short: Alkemio is ontworpen ten goede van de samenleving. Lees en accepteer de gebruiksvoorwaarden en Privacybeleid voordat u verder gaat.

accept-terms.introduction:
Alkemio makes it easy to manage $t(common.subspaces) and have contributors, from anywhere, working together on solutions. $t(common.subspaces) take center-stage. Focus is on the destination.

To keep the platform safe, open, and constructive, every user must accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy. Please read the these documents and accept them below before you continue.

knowledge.title: Kennis
knowledge.description: De antwoorden die {{name}} geeft zijn gebaseerd op de kennisbank uit:

personality.title: Basis Prompts & Machine
personality.description: To allow people to interact with the body of knowledge described above, Alkemio uses an engine and a basic set of instructions. These instructions make sure that the $t(common.virtual-contributor) for example only answers questions using the specified body of knowledge so you can trust the answers it is giving.

context.title: Context
context.description: {{name}} uses the following information from the $t(common.space) it is invited to so it can provide you with meaningful answers:

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.description: Voor Alkemio is het beschermen van je gegevens van het allergrootste belang. We zijn vastbesloten om de veiligheid en privacy van je informatie te waarborgen.
privacy.bullets:
• When interacting with a $t(common.virtual-contributor), only the data explicitly specified on the left (Context) is used to generate meaningful answers.
  • Importantly, your ($t(common.space)) data is not utilized for training the $t(common.virtual-contributor).
  • Additionally, please note that questions and answers exchanged with the $t(common.virtual-contributor) may be visible to the Alkemio team.

personality.description: This $t(common.virtual-contributor) operates using the following external AI service: Mistral. All questions submitted to this $t(common.virtual-contributor), along with any related $t(common.comments) in a threaded conversation, will be sent to Mistral. Please be aware that this data may be used to train and improve their model.

privacy.description: At Alkemio, protecting your data is our top priority. We are fully committed to ensuring the security and privacy of your information. Hereâ€™s how we handle your data when interacting with a $t(common.virtual-contributor) (VC):
privacy.bullets:
• Only the content of your question and any related $t(common.comments) in a threaded conversation are shared with the AI service that powers the $t(common.virtual-contributor).
  • Please be aware that if the $t(common.virtual-contributor) is based on an external AI service, such as Mistral, the data shared may be used to further train and improve that service.
  • Additionally, note that questions and answers exchanged with the $t(common.virtual-contributor) may be accessible to the Alkemio team for monitoring or support purposes.

help-dialog.title: Op zoek naar hulp?
help-dialog.text:
Wij willen je graag helpen met het werken op het Alkemio platform door het gebruik en de interactie makkelijker maken. Zo kun jij succesvol impact maken en bijdragen aan de Challenges waar je om geeft.

Klik op de onderstaande icons om antwoorden op je vragen te vinden, contact op te nemen met het Alkemio team voor ondersteuning, of ga meteen aan de slag!

messages.request-recover-password:
Een e-mail met een herstellink is verstuurd naar het opgegeven e-mailadres.

Als je geen e-mail hebt ontvangen, Controleer het volgende:

  • Controleer de spelling van het e-mailadres.
  • zorg ervoor dat je het e-mailadres gebruikt waarmee je je hebt geregistreerd.
  • Controleer je spam of ongewenste map
  • Als je je hebt geregistreerd met LinkedIn, Microsoft of een andere sociale login, dan werkt wachtwoord herstel via e-mail niet. Gebruik in plaats daarvan de respectievelijke optie voor social login.


    • Opmerking: Dit bevestigt niet dat een account geregistreerd is met deze e-mail.

Enjoy!

existingSpace.title: Choose a $t(common.spaceSubspace)
existingSpace.description: Which $t(common.space) or $t(common.subspace) do you want to bring to life with the $t(common.virtual-contributor)? Below you'll be able to choose from all $t(common.spaces) and $t(common.subspaces) that you are $t(common.host) of.
existingSpace.label: $t(common.spaceSubspace)
existingSpace.noSpaces: You need to be an $t(common.admin) of a $t(common.space) to proceed with this option. To create a $t(common.virtual-contributor) without a $t(common.space), please go back and follow the Written Knowledge flow.

chooseCommunity.title: Hallo, {{vcName}}!
chooseCommunity.description: Your $t(common.virtual-contributor) is ready! To start interacting, your $t(common.virtual-contributor) should be added to a $t(common.space). Select one below, or continue without. In that case you will have to add the VC manually through the $t(common.community) tab of a $t(common.space).
chooseCommunity.label: Space

confirm.title: Continue without $t(common.space) $t(common.membership)
confirm.description: A $t(common.virtual-contributor) can only interact within a $t(common.space). Are you sure you want to proceed without adding them to a $t(common.space)? You can still invite the $t(common.virtual-contributor) later through the $t(common.space)â€™s $t(common.community) tab.
